title: The English rogue continued in the life of Meriton Latroon, and other extravangants comprehending the most eminent cheats of most trades professions. The second part. Licensed Feb. 22. 1669
author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?
publisher: printed for Francis Kirkman, and are to be sold by William Rands in Duck-lane,
notes: By Richard Head. A work of fiction based upon his early life.
Running title reads: The English rogue, and other extravagants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
